lines.text: Oh well it does have a certain charm, in an Amityville kind of way.
They've been around people all their lives... so they're not afraid at all.

[Firing a revolver at the dominant male cat only to see it just squirts water]
Great going Doc/Nice one doc.

[to her sister]
Just don't get too dependent on him okay, because he's my husband!
Mr.Jarrett, we are talking about a cat! Get a grip on yourself

[interrupting]
No wait a minute, my dog's been ripped to shreds, my... my room's destroyed, my sinuses are completely inflamed I... I think I've got a right to be concerned.
Could we at least call a vet?
Lindsey I don't need a vet to teach me how cats behave, I know how they behave, that's why I have a dog.
You know what you found in your bedroom sounds like... err... the dominant male marking his territory.

[as he electrocutes the Alpha male]
Yeah kitty... how'd you like that?
So what are you try... say...? So we have a wild cat living in our backyard.
